meanings.definition: A feeling of reassurance or relaxation after anxiety or distress.
meanings.sent1: The warm hug from her mother brought her great relief.
meanings.sent2: After the storm passed, a sense of relief washed over the town.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful antics provided some relief from the seriousness of the meeting.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was a relief, like a burst of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The cool breeze on a hot day was a welcome relief for everyone.

meanings.definition: Assistance or support given to those in need.
meanings.sent1: The volunteers offered relief to the victims of the natural disaster.
meanings.sent2: The relief efforts included providing food and shelter to the displaced families.
meanings.sent3: The kind stranger's offer of a ride was a relief to the tired hiker.
meanings.sent4: Her words of encouragement were a relief to his troubled mind.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to provide relief to the struggling families.

meanings.definition: The removal or lessening of pain or discomfort.
meanings.sent1: The pain relief medication quickly eased his headache.
meanings.sent2: Applying ice to the injury brought some relief to the swelling.
meanings.sent3: The soothing music provided relief to her aching muscles.
meanings.sent4: The gentle massage brought relief to his tense shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The warm bath offered much-needed relief after a long day.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that alleviates pain or distress.
meanings.sent1: She was a true relief to her friends during tough times.
meanings.sent2: The therapy dog was a source of relief for the patients in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: His jokes were a relief during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent4: The kind words of the stranger acted as a relief to her worries.
meanings.sent5: The presence of her best friend was a relief in the midst of chaos.

meanings.definition: The projection of a figure or design from a flat surface.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful relief sculpture on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The intricate details of the relief added depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent3: The relief of the mountain range on the map helped hikers navigate.
meanings.sent4: The relief of the logo on the sign made it stand out from a distance.
meanings.sent5: The relief of the carvings on the monument told a story of the past.
